items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
items.title: orchidjs/tom-select: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.title: Linkerin/spectrum: Spectrum is a lightweight JS / TS library designed to simplify color manipulation and conversion tasks.

items.content_html: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.
items.title: MrTG1B/Lumen_Dashboard: Lumen Dashboard is a lightweight data visualization platform using the Lumen micro-framework. It provides real-time insights through customizable widgets and responsive design for desktop and mobile. With RESTful API integration, it enables efficient monitoring of system activities, empowering users to make informed decisions.

items.content_html: This project is a flexible, lightweight chatbot built to handle dynamic conversations and show the practical development steps in building a multi-modal AI chatbot client
items.title: devroy10/liveprompter-ai:  This project is a flexible, lightweight chatbot built to handle dynamic conversations and show the practical development steps in building a multi-modal AI chatbot client

items.content_html: Stateflow-lib is a lightweight React library for centralized global state management using the React Context API. It allows seamless state sharing across components without prop drilling, with custom hooks for accessing and updating the state. Fully TypeScript-supported for type safety and scalability.
items.title: youngsavage-codes/stateflow-lib: Stateflow-lib is a lightweight React library for centralized global state management using the React Context API. It allows seamless state sharing across components without prop drilling, with custom hooks for accessing and updating the state. Fully TypeScript-supported for type safety and scalability.
